description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'SettingsScreen' which renders a settings page for user preferences, including handling UI elements such as toggles, dropdowns, and buttons to modify preferences like notifications, contrast, language, and font size.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that builds a user interface for app settings, including notifications, contrast, language, and font size options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the SettingsScreen, displaying various preference controls and handling loading and error states.
